column5: Anyone ever try XM Radio in the Nakina area? Thinking of taking the radio on the trip this year.

I don't know where Nakina is, but we have taken Sirius radio out on flly out trips for years to listen to the Vikings football games in the Fall. Always able to get reception, except a little tougher in the cabin.
We used sirius radio all the way up to Geraldton which isn't far from Nakina without any issues.

We took a portable XM radio / CD player up in June to NW Ontario and it worked great. Caught the Blackhawks in the Stanley Cup - it was a savior. Just make sure you have a long antenna or good exposure to the southern sky. Bluff
Once we had satellite radio in the car and once we had a portable unit and both times we were able to pick up Pistons playoff games from the Nakina area.
Thank you all for the feedback....sounds like we shouldn't have a problem catching up on some football while we're up there.
Works Great north of the town of Savant Lake.Pooch
that's the beauty of sat radio..............you can get it ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD...................
